description: Creamy coconut milk, flavorful vegetable broth, and curry powder come together to create a simple yet delicious vegetable curry.
keywords: Vegan curry, Vegetable curry, vegetarian curry
name: 15-Minute Vegetable Curry

recipeInstructions.text: Add the frozen vegetables and broth to a soup pot (it's okay if the broth does not fully cover the vegetables). Place a lid on top and turn the heat on to high. Bring the broth up to a boil.
Give the vegetables a good stir, turn the heat down to low, then add the coconut milk, curry powder, and ginger. Stir to combine, then let simmer for just a few more minutes.
Taste the broth and add salt and pepper to your liking.
Serve hot with bread or rice.
